comment.body:
> @RealGoldenGeneral Which filter causes it?

I went through each and everyone of my filters and I found that AdGuard base and Easylist both block the script required to show items in the shop. I also found out that the problem fixes itself when you refresh

issue.title: Kylie.com - Various breakage (AdGuard Annoyances filter) [GDPR]
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.46.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.kylie.com/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

### Affected site:
`https://www.kylie.com/`

(Click "**CONTINUE TO SITE**")

### Issue:
Various breakage, due to a blocked cookie consent, which needs to be accepted.
E.g. the images for more YouTube videos (below the big embedded one) are missing, and the Merch items are out of position!

### Screenshot:
Not needed, as the problem is obvious.

### Problem filter:
* **AdGuard Annoyances filter**

### Problem rules:
`||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com^$third-party`
`||privacy-mgmt.com/mms^`

### Possible fixes:
Simply:
`@@||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com^$domain=kylie.com`

..or more specifically:
`@@||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com^*/wrapperMessagingWithoutDetection.js$domain=kylie.com`
`@@||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com/mms/*/get_site_data?$domain=kylie.com`
`@@||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com/privacy-manager/$domain=kylie.com`
In this case, the last rule is needed in order to be able to customize your consents ("**SHOW PRIVACY MANAGER**").

### Other problem filters:
* **I don't care about cookies** (@kiboke)
 
`/wrapperMessagingWithoutDetection.js$domain=~standard.co.uk|~ladbible.com|~theguardian.com|~theguardian.com.|~bild.de|~autoweek.nl|~computerbild.de|~bold.dk|~welt.de|~t-online.de|~sport1.de|~focus.de|~chip.de|~faz.net|~n-tv.de|~wunderweib.de|~helpster.de|~tvmovie.de|~praxisvita.de|~cosmopolitan.de|~giga.de|~ostsee-zeitung.de|~sky.com|~lvz.de|~mein-schoener-garten.de|~boerse-online.de|~tvspielfilm.de|~autobild.de|~aftonbladet.se|~bike-bild.de|~bz-berlin.de|~travelbook.de|~cyberport.at|~cyberport.de|~golem.de|~express.de|~ksta.de|~utopia.de|~sky.it|~tv8.it|~cielotv.it|~bndestem.nl|~volkskrant.nl|~rundschau-online.de|~rtl2.de|~capital.fr|~derstandard.de|~derstandard.at|~unsere-helden.com|~rtl.de|~stern.de|~myaccount.hln.be|~nu.nl|~maennersache.de|~dpgmedia.nl|~destentor.nl|~zeit.de|~ad.nl|~dpgmedia.be|~heise.de|~t3n.de|~11freunde.de|~finanzen.at|~finanzen.net|~insider.com|~transfermarkt.at|~transfermarkt.ch|~transfermarkt.co.uk|~transfermarkt.com|~transfermarkt.com.tr|~transfermarkt.de|~transfermarkt.fr|~transfermarkt.it|~transfermarkt.nl|~transfermarkt.pl|~transfermarkt.pt|~transfermarkt.us|~vip.de|~businessinsider.de|~clever-tanken.de|~fitbook.de|~idealo.at|~idealo.co.uk|~idealo.de|~idealo.es|~idealo.fr|~idealo.it|~meinestadt.de|~metal-hammer.de|~musikexpress.de|~myhomebook.de|~noizz.de|~politico.eu|~rollingstone.de|~stylebook.de|~techbook.de|~testbild.de|~wieistmeineip.at|~wieistmeineip.de|~wieistmeineip.ch`

%2520Brain%2520and%2520Behavior%2520Institute%2520at%2520Columbia%2520University.%2520Additional%2520contributors%2520included%2520Marianna%2520Zazhytska%252C%2520Albana%2520Kodra%252C%2520Hani%2520Shayya%252C%2520Stuart%2520Firestein%252C%2520Peter%2520Canoll%252C%2520and%2520James%2520Goldman.%2520Also%2520making%2520important%2520contributions%2520were%2520study%2520authors%2520John%2520Fullard%2520and%2520Panos%2520Roussos%2520of%2520the%2520Icahn%2520School%2520of%2520Medicine%2520at%2520Mt.%2520Sinai%253B%2520Arina%2520Omer%2520of%2520Baylor%2520Genetics%2520in%2520Houston%253B%2520and%2520Qizhi%2520Gong%2520of%2520the%2520Department%2520of%2520Cell%2520Biology%2520and%2520Human%2520Anatomy%252C%2520School%2520of%2520Medicine%252C%2520University%2520of%2520California%2520at%2520Davis.%2520Funding%2520for%2520the%2520study%2520was%2520provided%2520by%2520National%2520Institutes%2520of%2520Health%2520grants%2520NIDCD%25203R01DC018744-01S1%2520and%2520U01DA052783%252C%2520as%2520well%2520as%2520by%2520a%2520Howard%2520Hughes%2520Medical%2520Institute%2520Faculty%2520Scholar%2520Award%2520and%2520the%2520Zegar%2520Family%2520Foundation.%250A)
